class.name: NavigationRaycastHit2D
class.brief_description: Metadata container for map get raycast to point.
class.description: This class contains the metadata from [method NavigationServer2D.map_get_raycast_to_point].

members.member: Whether the raycast hit anything. This is the same value as returned by [method NavigationServer2D.map_get_raycast_to_point].
The normal to the edge that the raycast hit.
The position at which the raycast hit.
The path followed by the raycast, with points at the start, at each edge crossed, and the end.
